doc.title: Usokoi
doc.plot: A struggling young photographer engaged to a rich woman has just finished making the arrangements for a huge wedding ceremony. Everything looks fine until he goes to the city hall to register the marriage and discovers he's already married! It turns out that a Chinese woman, using the ID from his stolen wallet, forged a marriage certificate in order to get a visa to work in Japan. Can he find some way to fix the mess she's gotten him into?
